>To help ourselves understnd the variables and the relationship between them and answer relevant questions, and since we have 81 variables, we'll select the key ones by subseting df.
> We'll choose  
>LoanOriginalAmount
>BorrowerRate
>LoanStatus
>IncomeRange
>BorrowerState
>ListingCategory
>EmploymentStatus
>CurrentCreditLines
>ListingKey
>LoanKey
